cards.rules_text:
{U}{R}, Sacrifice a creature that dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn: Put Mother of Ants from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of each of your postcombat main phase, add {R} for each 2 life your opponents have lost this turn.

Whenever The Forge of Days attacks, you may put a creature card you own in exile onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Its owner puts it on the bottom of their library at the beginning of the next end step.

Reach
If you would draw a card, instead mill three cards.
{1}: Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

Lifelink
Other Vampires you control get +2/+0.
Creature tokens you control are Vampires in addition to their other types.
Sacrifice a Vampire: The Red Grail deals 3 damage to any target. Activate only once during each of your turns.

Lifelink
Whenever The Thunderskin attacks, create an enchantment token named Heartbeat with “{G}{W}, Sacrifice this permanent: Return target card named The Thunderskin from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.”

{T}: Add {W}. You lose 1 life unless you control a white permanent.
Exhaust — {T}: Choose a color. 
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

Surveil 2, then draw a card.
Whenever Drown in Self Reflection leaves your graveyard during your turn, you may cast a copy of it.

When Identity Connoisseur enters, target player discards a card.
Whenever a player discards a card with a creature type, you embrace it, and you may spend mana as though it was mana of any color to cast it.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Illuminant Spire: Search your library for an Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Ivory Spire: Search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Searing Spire: Search your library for a Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Silent Spire: Search your library for a Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Twisted Spire: Search your library for a Fault card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
{T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Spire: Search your library for a Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

{T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
{6}, {T}, Exile True Blood of Saint Janus: Cast a copy of a spell with mana value X or less exiled by True Blood of Saint Janus, where X is the number of cards exiled by True Blood of Saint Janus. Activate only as sorcery.

When The Heart of Ischav enters, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, exile a basic land card you own from your sanctum.
{T}: Add one mana of any color basic lands you control could produce.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Return a basic land card exiled with The Heart of Ischav to your hand.
Choose target nonland permanent with a creature type. Its owner embraces it.

cards.rules_text:
As this realm enters, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
cards.special_text: This card can start in your sanctum.

cards.rules_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wanderer's Shrine: Put a basic land card you own from your sanctum onto the battlefield.
[i]Converge[/i] — Falling Sparks deals damage to each creature and planeswalker equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell. You gain that much life.

Pathbound {2}. Activate only if there are no other cards in your sanctum.
Discard your hand, then draw three cards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The sun set as it always had, continuing the cycle for yet another day.[/i]

Call of the Rose deals 2 damage to any target. 
Create Lover to All in your reserves. He's a legendary 2/3 red Human Noble creature token with menace.

The Gardener, Crowned costs {1} less to cast for each nonland colorless permanent you control.
[+2]: Create three 1/1 colorless Faerie Horror creature tokens with flying that can't block.
[-3]: Gain control of target permanent until The Gardener leaves the battlefield.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “You may look at the top card of your library any time and you may play lands and cast colorless spells from the top of your library.”

cards.rules_text: Create two 1/1 Wonder creature tokens that are all colors. When you do, up to one target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Let your eyes wide, your mind open, and your muscles spring.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard. It has haste and isn't legendary. Sacrifice it at end of turn.
